FOUND IN: Prolonged underfeeding: An extended period during which an individual does not receive adequate amounts of food, resulting in continuous feelings of hunger and nutritional deficiencies.
Puns with a play on words related to emptying out one's resources: "I tried eating away my money but realized it was just too costly for dinner."
Kong (in "King Kong" franchise, while not directly a great ape of film clue, has influenced depictions of apes)
